#summary Running osgWorks.

= Set PATH =

Set your PATH environment variable so that the operating ststem can find the osgWorks binary files. This is the install location, such as /usr/local/bin or C:\Program Files\osgWorks\bin.

= Set OSG_FILE_PATH =

Set your OSG_FILE_PATH environment variable so that OSG and osgWorks can find the osgWorks "data" directory. The path will depend on the location of your osgWorks source tree.
